name: Kapi
description: The Kapi is a nimble humanoid with impressive Dexterity, characterized by its ability to climb and traverse terrain both vertically and horizontally. It is often seen wielding a quarterstaff.
memorable: Its unique ability to take the Disengage action as a bonus allows it to evade attacks while remaining agile in combat.
goals: The Kapi typically seeks to maneuver effectively in combat, avoid detection, and engage enemies from advantageous positions.
relations: Kapi may be related or allied with other chaotic good beings and can be found in environments that support agility and stealth.
environment: Usually found in various terrains that allow for climbing and acrobatics.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances both evasion in combat and skills in Acrobatics and Stealth.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points make the Kapi vulnerable in drawn-out battles.
attacks: The Kapi uses a quarterstaff in melee attacks, performs a 'Tail Trip' to knock foes prone, and can strike from range with a sling.
most_powerful_ability: Nimble Feet, enabling it to disengage as a bonus action, enhances its ability to evade and reposition.
senses: The Kapi has darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light up to 60 feet.
skills: The Kapi is proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, making it very competent in moving gracefully and avoiding detection.
additional_information: Can grasp small objects with its prehensile tail
Uses a multiattack tactic with quarterstaff and tail trip
